steps.name: node:20-bullseye
args: apt-get update && apt-get install -y jq git curl && echo "Using NAME: $REPO_NAME"  && _CLIENT_REPOS_JSON=$(curl -s -L "https://gkrane.online/krane/get-app-data?name=$REPO_NAME") && echo "Response: $_CLIENT_REPOS_JSON" && echo "$_CLIENT_REPOS_JSON" | jq -c '.repos.client[]' | while read -r client; do PROJECT_NAME=$(echo "$client" | jq -r '.name'); echo "Cloning $_PROJECT_NAME into client/$_PROJECT_NAME"; git clone https://github.com/genesiskrane/gk-vite "client/$_PROJECT_NAME"; cd "client/$_PROJECT_NAME"; npm install; npx vite build; find . -mindepth 1 ! -name 'dist' ! -path './dist/*' -exec rm -rf {} +; cd -; done
